item.name: The Islander Estate Vineyards
item.description: Established by one of the most famous Flying Winemakers in the world, Bordeaux-born and trained and part-time Australian resident Jacques Lurton. He has established a close-planted vineyard; the principal varieties are cabernet franc, shiraz and sangiovese, with lesser amounts of grenache, malbec, semillon and viognier. The wines are made and bottled at the onsite winery, in true estate style. Exports to the UK, Canada, France, Denmark, Holland, Finland, United Arab Emirates, Hong Kong, Macau and China.
